verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Draw me Close to you, newline Never let me go, newline I'll lay it all down again newline To hear you say that I'm your friend.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You are my desire, newline No one else will do newline Cause no one else could take your place newline I feel the warmth of your embrace newline Help me find the way newline Lead me back to you..

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You're all I want newline You're all I've ever needed newline You're all I want newline Help me know that You are never
